mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ORDER (LOGIN_ID, PICKUP_DEST, DEST, ITEM, REPLACE_ITEM, ORDER_TIME ) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{pickupDest}, #{dest}, #{item}, #{replaceItem}, #{orderTime})
mapper.select: SELECT B.BRAND_NAME, A.PICKUP, A.PICKUP_DEST, A.DEST, A.ITEM, A.REPLACE_ITEM, A.ORDER_TIME, A.DRIVER_NUM, A.PRICE, A.ORDER_NUM, A.LOGIN_ID FROM TB_ORDER A LEFT JOIN TB_USER B ON A.LOGIN_ID = B.LOGIN_ID ORDER BY ORDER_TIME DESC
